Title: A Letter Written on Torn Paper
Text:
My dear boy,

Leaving you is the last thing I want, but these troubled times force my hand. All I can offer now are a few words on this torn paper.

Stand tall and live your life with pride. Your parents gave their lives for the dignity of art, and you carry the same blood in your veins.

I've sacrificed my freedom in pursuit of the endless mysteries these Echoes hold, but I believe in youâ€”you have a strong heart. Hold on to hope and keep moving forward.

One day, the treasure we have valued deep within the Averardo Vault will bring forth new hope.

With Love,
Ash
